annotation.spannedText: the U.S. is experiencing a multi-state measles outbreak ... started at Disneyland this past December

classMention.mentionClass: the U.S. is experiencing a multi-state measles outbreak ... started at Disneyland this past December

annotation.spannedText: mixing tourists from countries where vaccination rates are low, with U.S. kids whose parents don't vaccinate them for medical or personal reasons, is a likely cause of the current outbreak

classMention.mentionClass: mixing tourists from countries where vaccination rates are low, with U.S. kids whose parents don't vaccinate them for medical or personal reasons, is a likely cause of the current outbreak

annotation.spannedText: The timing of the current outbreak, starting during school vacations for many people in the U.S., likely made measles spread more quickly

classMention.mentionClass: The timing of the current outbreak, starting during school vacations for many people in the U.S., likely made measles spread more quickly

annotation.spannedText: Dr. George Rutherford, vice chair of the department of epidemiology and biostatistics at the University of California, San Francisco,

classMention.mentionClass: Dr. George Rutherford, vice chair of the department of epidemiology and biostatistics at the University of California, San Francisco,
